trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_SEQ_00<tab>Managingway needs someone to retrieve a machine on the run.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_TODO_00<tab>Search for the prototype supporter near Heimdall's Last Sight.
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the prototype supporter to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_MANAGINGWAY_000_000<tab>There's been an emergency call from Inventingway! One of his supporters under development has taken off without warning.
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>There's been an emergency call from Inventingway! Another one of his supporters has taken off without warning.
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>We tracked the machine as far as Heimdall's Last Sight, where deadly Allagan weapons are known to prowl.
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_MANAGINGWAY_000_003<tab>As much as I dislike delegating dangerous tasks, we need you to find and retrieve the supporter. Please hurry...and be careful!
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>The supporter has ceased to function. Managingway will be eager to have it back.
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_MANAGINGWAY_000_020<tab>Ah, you're back, and none the worse for the wear, thank goodness. You were able to retrieve our runaway supporter, I hope?
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_MANAGINGWAY_000_021<tab>We're in your debt! Lest you wonder, this machine was designed to serve as our playmate.
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_MANAGINGWAY_000_022<tab>In taking off as it did, it appears to have mistakenly identified the Allagan weapons as friends.
TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_MANAGINGWAY_100_022<tab>We're in your debt─again. It appears the machine still mistakenly identifies the Allagan weapons as friends...

TEXT_BANLOP111_04697_MANAGINGWAY_000_023<tab>We all need dreams, and it's a fine thing that Inventingway is dedicated to realizing his. I just wish he didn't create work for others in the process. It rather defeats the purpose of coming up with inventions to make our lives easier.
